sources.title: Midshipman Easy
sources.description: A young man who runs away from home, joins the navy and goes to sea in the 1790s. He rescues a captive woman from a Spanish ship and battles pirates and smugglers.

metadata.Plot: Set during the Peninsular Campaign of the Napoleonic War, Mr Midshipman Easy has just joined the Royal Navy. He is very keen to do well (some would say too keen) but luckily he has an understanding captain to pull him out of the various adventures he seems to get involved in.
metadata.Actors: Hughie Green, Margaret Lockwood, Harry Tate
